message: This proposal aims to divide the funds based on the current value, with a slight emphasis on a larger share for you in the first round.
A more balanced approach for a better outcome
Considering the inflation, I propose a more equitable distribution, aiming for a balanced split in the face of diminishing value.
Trying to balance the value loss with a slight edge for you
In an effort to maintain fairness, I propose a split that reflects the current value loss, with a slight adjustment to ensure neither party feels overly disadvantaged.
Equal split to avoid further negotiation
